sentences.en: "But we might ruin the stove." — "Who cares?"
sentences.cn: “可我们会把炉子弄坏的!”——“我才不在乎呢！”

sentences.en: a pot of soup simmering on the stove
sentences.cn: 在炉灶上煨着的一锅汤

sentences.en: A spotless stove told us that his mother is a diligent housekeeper.
sentences.cn: 炉子清洁无瑕就表明他母亲是个勤劳的主妇.

sentences.en: A thin curl of smoke rose from a rusty stove.
sentences.cn: 生锈的炉子里冒出一缕青烟。

sentences.en: Asbestos can be used to insulate a cooking stove.
sentences.cn: 石棉能用来使烹调用的炉灶绝热.

sentences.en: I quickly drew my hand away from the hot stove.
sentences.cn: 我迅速把手从那灼热的炉子上移开.

sentences.en: It's expensive to leave the electric stove on all day.
sentences.cn: 整天开着电炉太浪费钱了.

sentences.en: Please keep an eye on the stove in case the milk boils.
sentences.cn: 劳神照料炉上的牛奶,别沸溅了.

sentences.en: Please warm up this milk over the stove.
sentences.cn: 请把这牛奶放在炉子上热一热.

sentences.en: Put a chimney on the stove to make the fire draw.
The ashes must be scraped out from the stove.
The heady aroma of wood fires emanated from the stove.
sentences.cn: 炉子里散发出木柴燃烧时的浓烈香味。

sentences.en: The soup is warming up on the stove.
The stove is on wheels so it can be shuffled around easily.
sentences.cn: 这个炉子底下带轮子，很容易四处移动。

sentences.en: The water is warming on the stove.
Turn off that stove — you're smoking the place out!
sentences.cn: 快把炉子关上——你把这儿弄得都是烟.

trans.tran_en: a piece of kitchen equipment on which you cook food in pots and pans, and that contains an  oven
